i.c: : Alexa Skills Kit requires HTTPS endpoints

title: Option A (Laravel) - BEST FIT for Alexa
h
blue

i.c: Option A (Laravel) - BEST FIT for Alexa

title:
laravel-project/
├── app/
│   ├── Domain/ (pure business logic)
│   ├── Application/ (use cases)
│   ├── Infrastructure/
│   │   ├── Repositories/
│   │   └── Alexa/ (NEW - Alexa-specific adapters)
│   │       ├── AlexaSkillController.php
│   │       ├── AlexaResponseBuilder.php
│   │       ├── AlexaAccountLinker.php
│   │       └── AlexaWebhookHandler.php
│   └── Http/
│       └── Controllers/
│           ├── Api/ (traditional API)
│           └── Alexa/ (Alexa Skills endpoints)
├── routes/
│   ├── api.php
│   └── alexa.php (NEW - Alexa-specific routes)
└── config/
    └── alexa.php (NEW - Alexa configuration)

i.c:
laravel-project/
├── app/
│   ├── Domain/ (pure business logic)
│   ├── Application/ (use cases)
│   ├── Infrastructure/
│   │   ├── Repositories/
│   │   └── Alexa/ (NEW - Alexa-specific adapters)
│   │       ├── AlexaSkillController.php
│   │       ├── AlexaResponseBuilder.php
│   │       ├── AlexaAccountLinker.php
│   │       └── AlexaWebhookHandler.php
│   └── Http/
│       └── Controllers/
│           ├── Api/ (traditional API)
│           └── Alexa/ (Alexa Skills endpoints)
├── routes/
│   ├── api.php
│   └── alexa.php (NEW - Alexa-specific routes)
└── config/
    └── alexa.php (NEW - Alexa configuration)

title: Option B (Pure Hexagonal) - CHALLENGING for Alexa
h
blue

src/
├── Core/ (same domain/application)
└── Infrastructure/
    ├── Web/
    │   ├── Alexa/ (NEW adapter)
    │   │   ├── SkillHandler.php
    │   │   ├── WebhookController.php
    │   │   └── ResponseFormatter.php
    │   ├── Laravel/ (for other delivery)
    │   └── API/ (REST endpoints)
    └── Persistence/

i.c:
src/
├── Core/ (same domain/application)
└── Infrastructure/
    ├── Web/

    │   │   ├── WebhookController.php

    │   ├── Laravel/ (for other delivery)
    │   └── API/ (REST endpoints)
    └── Persistence/

title: •  Need to build HTTPS infrastructure from scratch

i.c: •  Need to build HTTPS infrastructure from scratch

title: •  OAuth flows - more complex without framework

i.c: •  OAuth flows - more complex without framework

title:
services/
├── alexa-gateway-service/ (Slim - handles all Alexa requests)
├── user-service/
├── publisher-service/
├── subscriber-service/
└── notification-service/

i.c:
services/
├── alexa-gateway-service/ (Slim - handles all Alexa requests)
├── user-service/
├── publisher-service/
├── subscriber-service/
└── notification-service/

title: •  Service coordination - voice commands need fast responses

i.c: •  Service coordination - voice commands need fast responses

i.c: •  Complexity overhead - microservices for single voice interface

title: •  Network hops - multiple service calls = slower responses
